leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-组学整合与知识图谱生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 对齐→融合→推理→检索→证据链→评测

tools.name: PaperQA
tools.one_line_profile: High-accuracy RAG agent for answering questions from scientific literature with citation grounding
tools.detailed_description: An agentic RAG library designed to retrieve information from scientific papers (PDFs/text) and generate answers with precise inline citations. It minimizes hallucinations by treating search as a multi-step process involving evidence gathering, ranking, and provenance tracking, specifically tailored for scientific workflows.

tools.name: Medical-Graph-RAG
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based RAG system for evidence-based medical information retrieval
tools.detailed_description: A Retrieval-Augmented Generation system that constructs and utilizes medical knowledge graphs to enhance evidence retrieval and reasoning for medical question answering. It integrates structured knowledge (KG) with unstructured text to improve accuracy and provide evidence chains in medical domains.

tools.name: biogpt.cpp
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance C/C++ inference engine for BioGPT models
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight, efficient port of Microsoft's BioGPT model using ggml, enabling high-speed biomedical text generation and analysis on consumer hardware without heavy dependencies.

tools.name: RAG-HPO
tools.one_line_profile: Automated deep phenotype analysis using LLMs and RAG
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for automated deep phenotype analysis of clinical information. It leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) to map clinical text to Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) terms.

tools.name: MedRAG
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit and benchmark for Medical Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). It provides unified interfaces for various retrievers and LLMs to evaluate and improve medical question answering systems.

tools.name: 3DMed-RAG
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal RAG system for medical consultation
tools.detailed_description: A multimodal medical consultation system (3DMed-RAG) that integrates text, image-text, and 3D medical imaging queries. It features domain-aligned negative rejection mechanisms and enhanced flowchart data processing for high-quality medical diagnosis and consultation.

tools.name: LingYi
tools.one_line_profile: KG-based Multi-modal Medical Conversational QA System
tools.detailed_description: A multi-modal medical conversational question answering system that leverages Knowledge Graphs (KG) to enhance response accuracy and context understanding in medical dialogues.

tools.name: SciTab
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and tools for compositional reasoning on scientific tables
tools.detailed_description: A challenging benchmark and associated tools for compositional reasoning and claim verification based on scientific tables. It supports the development of models that can verify facts against tabular scientific data.

tools.name: scientific-claim-generation
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating claims for zero-shot scientific fact checking
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by AllenAI for generating scientific claims to support zero-shot fact checking tasks. It aids in creating synthetic data or test cases for verifying scientific information.

tools.name: SciFact
tools.one_line_profile: Models and data for scientific claim verification
tools.detailed_description: The official repository for the SciFact task, providing models (like VeriSci) and evaluation scripts for verifying scientific claims against a corpus of abstracts. It serves as a standard tool for scientific fact-checking research.

tools.name: Trust-Align
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for measuring and enhancing trustworthiness of LLMs in RAG
tools.detailed_description: A research toolkit providing datasets and methods to measure and improve the trustworthiness of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems through grounded attributions and refusal learning, specifically addressing hallucinations in scientific/factual contexts.

tools.name: RAG2
tools.one_line_profile: Rationale-Guided Retrieval Augmented Generation for Medical QA
tools.detailed_description: A medical question answering framework that employs a rationale-guided retrieval mechanism to enhance the accuracy and explainability of RAG systems in biomedical contexts.

tools.name: MultiVerS
tools.one_line_profile: Model for scientific claim verification against evidence
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model designed for scientific claim verification, capable of predicting fact-checking labels and identifying rationales from scientific abstracts to support or refute claims.

tools.name: webMedQA
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale Chinese medical question answering dataset
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset for Chinese medical question answering, collected from online health consultation platforms, serving as a resource for training and evaluating medical QA and RAG systems.

tools.name: diseaseBERT
tools.one_line_profile: BERT model infused with disease knowledge for health QA
tools.detailed_description: A pre-trained BERT model that incorporates disease knowledge to enhance performance on health question answering, medical inference, and disease name recognition tasks.

tools.name: viBioGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Vietnamese LLM for medical and healthcare QA
tools.detailed_description: A domain-specific Large Language Model fine-tuned for biomedical question answering in the Vietnamese language, addressing the lack of medical AI tools for low-resource languages.

tools.name: OntologyRAG
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical code mapping with RAG and Ontology Knowledge Graphs
tools.detailed_description: A system that leverages ontology knowledge graphs and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to perform accurate biomedical code mapping and entity normalization.

tools.name: medAlpaca
tools.one_line_profile: LLM fine-tuned for medical question answering
tools.detailed_description: A collection of open-source Large Language Models fine-tuned on diverse medical datasets to perform biomedical question answering and information retrieval tasks.

tools.name: paperqa-zotero
tools.one_line_profile: QA tool over Zotero library documents
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool that integrates Large Language Models with Zotero reference libraries, enabling researchers to perform question answering and evidence retrieval directly from their collected scientific literature.
